title: Creamy white asparagus, ham and mushroom salad
ingredients: ['Salad', '1kg white asparagus', '150g diced ham', '1 small tin of button mushrooms, drained', 'Dressing', '100g mayonnaise', '100g plain yoghurt', '1 teaspoon mustard', '2 tablespoons double cream', 'salt', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', 'dash of lemon juice', 'To serve', '4 hard-boiled eggs, sliced into quarters']
